scripts.build-server: rm -rf built && mkdir built && cd server && npm run build && cp -R dist/ ../built/
scripts.build-client: cd client/rsvpman && npm run build && cp -R dist/ ../../built/dist/client/
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.docker-prepare: npm run build && docker build . -t alombardo4/rsvpman:$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
scripts.docker-push: npm run docker-prepare && docker push alombardo4/rsvpman:$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm i && cd ../client/rsvpman && npm i
